      AgeQualifyingCode_Enum
      A code representing a business rule that determines the charges for a guest based upon age range (e.g. Adult, Child, Senior, Child With Adult, Child Without Adult). This attribute allows for an increase in rate by occupant class. Person age categories. Note: Age categories are typically used to qualify pricing and/or eligibility.
